Meteara's face remains expressionless. She sits down in a chair and 
examines the instruments around her. Shrugging some minor frustration, 
she turns to Firaxis.

Meteara: I can not understand your measurements. They are alien to me. 
What is our distance from objective and estimated time of arrival?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He nods and walks onto the ship.  "Come here Horn."  The dog 
comes 
> running onto the ship.  "Good boy, now sit.  Stay.  Good sit stay." 
 He pats 
> him on the head and takes the controls.  They lift off and head for 
the polar 
> region.
